div.div: Due to the State of Emergency surrounding the Coronavirus all BCSD facilities will be closed through May 15.
All student meals for the entire 5 days will still be included on the distribution days of Monday and Thursday.

a.title: BCSD Employee Named NY School Nutrition Association Employee of the Year

div.a: BCSD Employee Named NY School Nutrition Association Employee of the Year
div.div: Congratulations to Debbie Battaglia, who was named the NYS School Nutrition Association Employee of the Year award.

a.title: Videos Help BCSD Community Stay Connected

div.a: Videos Help BCSD Community Stay Connected
